synopsis.text: Golgo 13 is a mysterious professional assassin whose identity and origins are unknown. Armed with his customized M16 rifle and unmatched sniper skills enabling trick shots and lethal accuracy, Golgo 13 accepts high-risk assassination assignments globally for elite clientele if the price is right. Ruthlessly efficient and elusive, his record of successful contract kills has built his infamous reputation as a ghostly "killer of killers" while also making him a target of rival hitmen. In his shadowy world of international espionage filled with shifting alliances, Golgo 13 completes his missions solo while leaving a trail of casualties. Now the stoic cipher is back with a new slate of 13 high-stakes hits that will test his deadly precision against dangerous odds to satisfy his clients. However, completing these contracts may prove more of a challenge as Golgo 13 finds himself in the crosshairs of adversaries determined to eliminate the legendary assassin.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
